column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We showed up at the perfect time
column2: we walked in and were immediately seated! The staff was honest with the time it would take for everything which I have never experienced in a restaurant of any kind which was sweet. Being from the south
column3: we don't really eat deep dish so we had to try it while visiting Chicago and were told to try Lou Malnati's. The food was amazing. We shared a small Malnati Chicago Classic and a Chocolate Chip Pizza. I have never been happier to be so full!
